tasks.task: Drift irrigation system design for an ecological orchard
subtasks: Determine water source location and distribution
Install pressure regulator to manage high water pressure
Understand drip irrigation system components (emitters, filters, valves)
Calculate water requirements based on crop and environmental factors
Choose appropriate irrigation method (tree irrigation in this case)
Design pipe layout considering pressure drop and energy savings
Implement volumetric control and pressure measurement for each irrigation zone
Ensure uniform water distribution across all orchard plots
